title: Synergistic drug interactions of the histone deacetylase inhibitor givinostat (ITF2357) in CRLF2-rearranged pediatric B-cell precursor acute lymphoblastic leukemia identified by high-throughput drug screening
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Athanasios Oikonomou, Titus Watrin, Luigia Valsecchi, Katerina Scharov, Angela Maria Savino, Julian Schliehe-Diecks, Michela Bardini, Grazia Fazio, Silvia Bresolin, Andrea Biondi, Arndt Borkhardt, Sanil Bhatia, Giovanni Cazzaniga, Chiara Palmi
